description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Florence, Italy. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Tuscan Retreat with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Escape to the rolling hills of Tuscany with a dreamy five-star stay at COMO Castello Del Nero, a breathtaking 12th-century castle draped with Renaissance frescoes. Wake up in elegant Italian style each morning and enjoy the quintessential Tuscan scenery straight from a fairy tale. This pristine retreat is located 40 minutes from Florence and is the gateway to the region’s world-class Chianti vineyards and olive groves dotted across the hilltops. Indulge at the COMO Shambhala Retreat, where the bespoke treatments induce deep relaxation and restore balance to the mind, body and soul. Bask by the turquoise pool, before embarking on a culinary journey at the Michelin-starred La Torre restaurant, which uses local produce to enhance the authentic flavours and spirit of the region.

hotels.title: Tranquil Florentine Elegance with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover the tranquil charm of Hotel Indigo Florence, an IHG Hotel, located in a vibrant Italian neighborhood just 10 minutes from the historic city centre. Explore the neighborhood's centuries-old history, including treasures like the Basilica of Santa Maria Novella and the world's oldest pharmacy, Officina Profumo Farmaceutica. Indulge in the best of Tuscan gastronomy at the Binomio Florence restaurant and terrace, while the lush garden with a pool invites you to enjoy breakfast or local wine.
